channel.title: Are the OrganisationRole codes what we need?
channel.description:
Flagging this as a discussion leading up to the TAG 2016
We have four [OrganisationRole codes](http://iatistandard.org/202/codelists/OrganisationRole/) in IATI. I believe this have been constant since the first version:
* Funding * Accountable * Extending * Implementing
Questions we might want to discuss
- Are these four "working"? There was a discussion around removal / definition of the Accountable code at the TAG in 2014 [here](http://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/question-about-deprecation-of-code-list-organisation-role-accountable/39) and [here](http://support.iatistandard.org/entries/41095068-Deprecate-code-list-organisation-role-accountable) - Does the community present any use-cases for new additional OrganisationRoles? In passing, I've heard ideas for "Partner" and "Lead Implementor" - but these are just examples.
It would be useful to understand if others have any feedback or requirements around this list - particularly as it can be a crucial part of the standard to help describe complex arrangements in development co-operation

item.title: Are the OrganisationRole codes what we need?
item.dc:creator: Wendy
item.description:
Thanks @stevieflow and I am just going to move this to the Standard Management -> Modification Additions & Improvements categories so that it can be cross ref’d to a TAG paper

Read full topic
item.source: Are the OrganisationRole codes what we need?

item.title: Are the OrganisationRole codes what we need?
item.dc:creator: stevieflow
item.description:
Flagging this as a discussion leading up to the TAG 2016

We have four OrganisationRole codes in IATI. I believe this have been constant since the first version:

  • Funding
  • Accountable
  • Extending
  • Implementing

Questions we might want to discuss

  • Are these four “working”? There was a discussion around removal / definition of the Accountable code at the TAG in 2014 here and here
  • Does the community present any use-cases for new additional OrganisationRoles? In passing, I’ve heard ideas for “Partner” and “Lead Implementor” - but these are just examples.

It would be useful to understand if others have any feedback or requirements around this list - particularly as it can be a crucial part of the standard to help describe complex arrangements in development co-operation

Read full topic
